Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
Hashed User passwords are recoverable through the Portal UI. 

*Why*
Plaintext or hashed passwords should not be shown in the UI.

*How*
The password field should be empty or display 10 asterisks or similar. The password value should have an on-change listener
Description.to:

*Why*

*How*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
Hashed User passwords are recoverable through the Portal UI.

Description.to:
*What*
Hashed User passwords are recoverable through the Portal UI. 

*Why*
Plaintext or hashed passwords should not be shown in the UI.

*How*
The password field should be empty or display 10 asterisks or similar. The password value should have an on-change listener so new passwords values can be entered and then saved.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
Hashed User passwords are recoverable through the Portal UI. 

*Why*
Plaintext or hashed passwords should not be shown in the UI.

*How*
The password field should be empty or display 10 asterisks or similar. The password value should have an on-change listener so new passwords values can be entered and then saved.
Description.to:
*What*
Hashed User passwords are recoverable through the Portal UI. 

*Why*
Plaintext or hashed passwords should not be shown in the UI.

*How*
The password field should be empty or display 10 asterisks or similar. The password value should have an on-change listener so new passwords values can be entered and then saved. Furthermore, it would be better if the password was not returned from the database on a user read.

Description.author: Summers Pittman
Description.from:
*What*
We should check how/when/why the password and other sensitive information is being returned from the database on a User Read.

*Why*
This information should not be returned to the user.
Description.to:
*What*
We should check how/when/why the password and other sensitive information is being returned from the database on a User Read.

*Why*
This information should not be returned to the user.

*Steps to reproduce*
Log into the mobile app.
Run the following in the JavaScript console
    angular.element(document.body).injector().get('userClient').read("rkX1fdSH").then(function(user){console.log(user.password);})

Description.author: Summers Pittman

Description.to:
*What*
We should check how/when/why the password and other sensitive information is being returned from the database on a User Read.

*Why*
This information should not be returned to the user.

*Steps to reproduce*
Log into the mobile app.
Run the following in the JavaScript console
    angular.element(document.body).injector().get('userClient').read("rkX1fdSH").then(function(user){console.log(user.password);})


If you change the user ID in the "Read" method you can get different users when you log in as them.

Description.author: Summers Pittman
Description.from:
*What*
We should check how/when/why the password and other sensitive information is being returned from the database on a User Read.

*Why*
This information should not be returned to the user.

*Steps to reproduce*
Log into the mobile app.
Run the following in the JavaScript console
    angular.element(document.body).injector().get('userClient').read("rkX1fdSH").then(function(user){console.log(user.password);})


If you change the user ID in the "Read" method you can get different users when you log in as them.
Description.to:
*What*
We should check how/when/why the password and other sensitive information is being returned from the database on a User Read.

*Why*
This information should not be returned to the user.

*Steps to reproduce*
Log into the mobile app.
Run the following in the JavaScript console
    angular.element(document.body).injector().get('userClient').read("rkX1fdSH").then(function(user){console.log(user.password);})


If you change the user ID in the "Read" method you can get different users even if you are NOT logged in as them.

*What*
It is possible to get past the login screen of the mobile app and access other views in the app.

Steps to Reproduce
Open up the Mobile App in a browser and run the following code in the console.

localStorage.setItem("fh.wfm.profileData", 'U2FsdGVkX1+TY8qNWyBQHYF2OEyInImXNwVG/sr6wthuWLRX7ZBY4V/VXmaQ0w9/bbQ==');
localStorage.setItem("fh_session_token._index_", '["fh_session_token.sessionToken"]');
localStorage.setItem("fh_session_token.sessionToken", '{"sessionToken":"123"}');

Navigate to any of the following
* /settings
* /files

Description.author: Wojciech Trocki
Description.from:
h4. Motivation

Create GridFS connector that would allow us to store files along with metadata into mongodb database. Connector should accept configuration from module user and should base on the file-storage-backbone.
Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create GridFS connector that would allow us to store files along with metadata into mongodb database. Connector should accept configuration from module user and should base on the file-storage-backbone.

Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create GridFS connector that would allow us to store files along with metadata into mongodb database. Connector should accept configuration from module user and should base on the file-storage-backbone. 

h4. Verification

1) Create new file
2) Check in databrowser if file was stored in files collection and file.chunks collection

Description.author: Wojciech Trocki
Description.from:
h4. Motivation

Create s3 connector that would allow to perform CRUD operations on s3 buckets. 
Connector should relay on configuration specified by users and use interface specified in file-storage backbone.
Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create s3 connector that would allow to perform CRUD operations on s3 buckets. 
Connector should relay on configuration specified by users and use interface specified in file-storage backbone.

Description.author: Wojciech Trocki
Description.from:
h4. Motivation

Create s3 connector that would allow to perform CRUD operations on s3 buckets. 
Connector should relay on configuration specified by users and use interface specified in file-storage backbone.
Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create s3 connector that would allow to perform CRUD operations on s3 buckets. 
Connector should relay on configuration specified by users and use interface specified in file-storage backbone.

h4. S3 integration

For integration we should use already existing node.js client:
https://github.com/andrewrk/node-s3-client

Configuration for client should be passed by developers directly as module configuration and should not change for running application.

Description.author: Wojciech Trocki
Description.from:
h4. Motivation

Create backbone for `wfm-file-storage` module that would support standard CRUD operations. Backbone should mock actual storage and just mount mediator events to plug-in different implementations like Gridfs and S3.
Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create backbone for `wfm-file-storage` module that would support standard CRUD operations. Backbone should mock actual storage and just mount mediator events to plug-in different implementations like Gridfs and S3.

Description.author: Wojciech Trocki
Description.from:
h4. Motivation

Create backbone for `wfm-file-storage` module that would support standard CRUD operations. Backbone should mock actual storage and just mount mediator events to plug-in different implementations like Gridfs and S3.
Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create backbone for `wfm-file-storage` module that would support standard CRUD operations. Backbone should mock actual storage and just mount mediator events to plug-in different implementations like Gridfs and S3. 

Module should subscribe to all storage topics that can be sent by file, signature or any other modules that would like to benefit from file storage services. 

h4. Initial set of subscribers

 - Create file
 - File list
 - Read file
 - Delete file

Description.author: Wojciech Trocki
Description.from:
h4. Motivation

Create backbone for `wfm-file-storage` module that would support standard CRUD operations. Backbone should mock actual storage and just mount mediator events to plug-in different implementations like Gridfs and S3. 

Module should subscribe to all storage topics that can be sent by file, signature or any other modules that would like to benefit from file storage services. 

h4. Initial set of subscribers

 - Create file
 - File list
 - Read file
 - Delete file
Description.to:
h4. Motivation

Create backbone for `wfm-file-storage` module that would support standard CRUD operations. Backbone should mock actual storage and just mount mediator events to plug-in different implementations like Gridfs and S3. 

Module should subscribe to all storage topics that can be sent by file, signature or any other modules that would like to benefit from file storage services. 

h4. Initial set of subscribers

 - Create file
 - File list
 - Read file
 - Delete file

All subscribers should support namespaces which would be mapped to s3 buckets or gridfs table names.

[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express -5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.16.0

(x) raincatcher-demo-auth

Description.to:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express -5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express -5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.16.0

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584

Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(x) *request* - Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open- -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.8.1 -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open- -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.8.1 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.8.1 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.8.1 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.1 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
fh-mbaas-express
fh-reporting-client
fh-mbaas-api
unified-node-sender

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(x) fh-reporting-client
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(x) unified-node-sender

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(x) fh-reporting-client
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(x) unified-node-sender

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - >1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(x) unified-node-sender

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Fix*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 0.0.7 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(x) unified-node-sender

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 0.0.7 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(x) unified-node-sender

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 0.0.7 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.16.0

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(x) fh-mbaas-express
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.16.0

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

*Why*

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express -5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - -Maintainers contacted / Community PR Open-  2.81.0 FIXED -  https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

*Why*

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(x) fh-mbaas-api

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.to:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - Will land in 

Aerogear Components Fix Status

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - Will land in 

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.to:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - PR Open - Will land in 6.1.7

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - PR Open - Will land in 6.1.7

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.to:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - PR Open - Will land in 6.1.7

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - PR Open - Will land in 6.1.7

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(x) raincatcher-file
(x) raincatcher-message
(x) raincatcher-push
(x) raincatcher-result
(x) raincatcher-risk-assessment
(x) raincatcher-store-simple
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workorder

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(+) fh-mbaas-api - PR Open - Will land in 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(x) raincatcher-file
(x) raincatcher-message
(x) raincatcher-push
(x) raincatcher-result
(x) raincatcher-risk-assessment
(x) raincatcher-store-simple
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workorder

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0 - https://github.com/request/request/pull/2584
(/) *express* - 4.15.2 - https://github.com/expressjs/express/commit/85c96fd64edad8ce076bb82c065ef0c9fea6c559
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1 - https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser/commit/e51dbc59ed1c3ca04541d2a4a79839762d2518e7
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0 - https://github.com/expressjs/multer/blob/869e2138af1d2b9cf62b8abb95e5785aef007b4b/package.json

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17

*Why*

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(x) raincatcher-push
(x) raincatcher-result
(x) raincatcher-risk-assessment
(x) raincatcher-store-simple
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workorder
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12
(x) raincatcher-result
(x) raincatcher-risk-assessment
(x) raincatcher-store-simple
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workorder
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12
(x) raincatcher-result
(+) raincatcher-risk-assessment - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-risk-assessment/pull/10
(x) raincatcher-store-simple
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workorder
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12

(x) raincatcher-store-simple
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workorder
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12
(+) raincatcher-result - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-result/pull/20
(+) raincatcher-risk-assessment - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-risk-assessment/pull/10
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(x) raincatcher-workflow
(x) raincatcher-workflow-angular

(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12
(+) raincatcher-result - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-result/pull/20
(+) raincatcher-risk-assessment - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-risk-assessment/pull/10
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14
(x) raincatcher-user
(x) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection
(+) raincatcher-workflow - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workflow/pull/18
(/) raincatcher-workflow-angular

(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12
(+) raincatcher-result - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-result/pull/20
(+) raincatcher-risk-assessment - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-risk-assessment/pull/10
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14
(x) raincatcher-user
(+) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-vehicle-inspection/pull/9
(+) raincatcher-workflow - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workflow/pull/18
(/) raincatcher-workflow-angular

(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status

*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17 - 0.1.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12 - 0.0.13-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Apps/Modules Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(x) raincatcher-demo-mobile

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5

(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(x) raincatcher-demo-portal
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(x) raincatcher-demo-cloud
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(x) raincatcher-demo-auth
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

*Why*

Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1
