Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17 - 0.1.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12 - 0.0.13-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-result - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-result/pull/20 - 0.2.1-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1
(+) raincatcher-workorder - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder/pull/22 - 0.2.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6 - 0.1.2-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17 - 0.1.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12 - 0.0.13-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-result - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-result/pull/20 - 0.2.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-risk-assessment - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-risk-assessment/pull/10 - 0.0.17-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(+) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-vehicle-inspection/pull/9 - 0.0.15-alpha-1
(+) raincatcher-workflow - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workflow/pull/18 - 0.2.1-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-workflow-angular
(+) raincatcher-workorder - 0.2.1
(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6 - 0.1.2-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-mediator

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Vulnerable Paths*

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17 - 0.1.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12 - 0.0.13-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-result - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-result/pull/20 - 0.2.1-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder - 0.2.1
(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6 - 0.1.2-alpha.1

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17 - 0.1.1-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-push - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-push/pull/12 - 0.0.13-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-result - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1

(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6 - 0.1.2-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message/pull/17 - 0.1.1-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-push - 0.0.13

(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1

(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-workorder-angular/pull/6 - 0.1.2-alpha.1

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-file-angular - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file-angular/pull/3 - Part of wtrocki's PR
(+) raincatcher-message - 0.1.1
(/) raincatcher-push - 0.0.13
(/) raincatcher-result - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder - 0.2.1
(+) raincatcher-workorder-angular - 0.2.1

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-file/pull/17 - 0.0.10-alpha.1
(/) raincatcher-file-angular - Part of wtrocki's PR
(/) raincatcher-message - 0.1.1
(/) raincatcher-push - 0.0.13
(/) raincatcher-result - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder-angular - 0.2.1

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - 0.1.1
(/) raincatcher-file-angular - Part of wtrocki's PR
(/) raincatcher-message - 0.1.1
(/) raincatcher-push - 0.0.13
(/) raincatcher-result - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(+) raincatcher-store-simple - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-simple-store/pull/14 - 0.1.3-alpha.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder-angular - 0.2.1

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

[Vulnerability Description|https://snyk.io/vuln/npm%3Aqs%3A20170213?utm_campaign=vuln_alert&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Vuln]

*Why*
To mitigate a vulnerability marked as _High Severity_ by Snyk/NSP.

*How*
Upgrade qs to version 6.4.0 or higher.

3rd Party Module Fix Status
(/) *request* - 2.81.0
(/) *express* - 4.15.2
(/) *body-parser* - 1.17.1
(/) *multer* - 1.0.0

Feedhenry Components Fix Status
(/) fh-mbaas-client - 0.16.5 
(/) fh-mbaas-express - 5.6.10
(/) fh-reporting-client - 0.5.5
(/) fh-mbaas-api - 6.1.8

Aerogear Components Fix Status
(/) unified-node-sender - 0.12.1

Raincatcher Demo Apps Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-demo-portal - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-portal/pull/48
(+) raincatcher-demo-auth - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-auth/pull/60
(+) raincatcher-demo-cloud - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-cloud/pull/70
(+) raincatcher-demo-mobile - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-demo-mobile/pull/46

Raincatcher Modules Fix Status
(+) raincatcher-file - 0.1.1
(/) raincatcher-file-angular - Part of wtrocki's PR
(/) raincatcher-message - 0.1.1
(/) raincatcher-push - 0.0.13
(/) raincatcher-result - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-risk-assessment - 0.0.17
(/) raincatcher-store-simple - 0.2.1
(+) raincatcher-user - https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-user/pull/58 - 0.5.1-alpha.2
(/) raincatcher-vehicle-inspection - 0.0.15
(/) raincatcher-workflow - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder - 0.2.1
(/) raincatcher-workorder-angular - 0.2.1

Paths marked below in *bold* are root paths that should be fixed first, these will then fix a large number of vulnerable paths going up the dependency tree.

_How to Retest_

Run `snyk test` inside a node module.

Description.author: Niall Donnelly
Description.to:
h3. What

This task covers the refactor of user functionality from the raincatcher demo applications to the raincatcher-user module

The raincatcher-user module should be split into 2 modules

- raincatcher-user-core
- raincatcher-user-angular

We may also want to consider creating a raincatcher-session module to extract the session functionality currently in the raincatcher-user module.

Summary.author: Niall Donnelly
Summary.from: Refactor User functionality to the modules.
Summary.to: Refactor User functionality to the modules.

Description.author: Tom Jackman
Description.from:
*What*
The full user data is being returned in the receiver object for a message in the mobile client and portal app.

*Why*
The password from the database and other information about the user is being returned.

*How*
Trim the response to not include certain fields of the profile data.

Description.to:
https://github.com/feedhenry-raincatcher/raincatcher-message
Implement E2E test from [Test Plan|https://trello.com/c/bPPSOIca/3-3-messages-e2e]


*Verification Steps*

* wfm start
* npm install
* grunt shell:wdmupdate
* grunt ui:local --specs=tests/messages-spec.js
* when test starts makes sure browser is fullscreen (navbar and search box disappear otherwise)
